name: GRANNY'S FAVORITE
description:
"Show me who the worthiest is !" Notary

WHO WILL INHERIT GRANNY'S LEGACY ?

DESCRIPTION:
Beloved  and crazy Granny has passed away but still wanted to have fun from above. In that matter, her will states that the worthiest of her children gets everything. Time to prove who is!

Developped during a 3-day game jam session by a group of 10 students, Granny's Favorite is a fun party-game involving 4 players who will have to compete against each other throughout 3 different mini games. 

TECHNICAL INFORMATION :
• Genre: Party-Game , Local Multiplayer
• Support: PC , Controllers
• Players: 4 Players only
• Camera: 2D Isométrique 
• Graphisme: 3D Voxel Art 
• Moteur: Unity 

TEAM :
- Producing: Emilie REGNIER / Franck NGUYEN
- Art: Théo BARBÉ / Erwan COCHON
- Game Design: Erwan COCHON / Franck NGUYEN
- Programming: Guillaume PEIGNOT, Jean HARDY, Mathilde RODRIGUES, Yannis DE MACEDO, Nolan JUTARD- Sound Design: Andrea "3D63" (External), Damien LECLERCQ (Outsourcing)
